K03pvspl_u:150: abhinirharati sa āsravakṣayābhijñāsākṣātkriyājñānam abhinirharati na śrāvakabhūmiṃ

K03pvspl_u:155: upādāya svabhāvopalabdhitām upādāya āsravakṣayajñānacetanām api notādayati nāsravakṣayasākṣātkriyābhijñājñānabhinirhāracetanām
K03pvspl_u:156: anyatra sarvākārajñatāmanasikārād evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ

K03pvspl_u:325: ca mahāśrāvakāṇān teṣāñ ca devaputrāṇāñ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmantaṃ
K03pvspl_u:326: śāriputram etad avocat tat kiñcid āyuṣmañ cchāriputra bhagavataś śrāvakā bhāṣante
K03pvspl_u:327: deśayanty udīrayanti sarvas sa tathāgatasya puruṣākāro veditavyas taṅ kasya hetor
K03pvspl_u:328: yo hi tathāgatena dharmo deśitas tasyān dharmadeśanāyāṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavataś śrāvakās
K03pvspl_u:329: tān dharmatāṃ sākṣātkurvanti tān dharmatāṃ sākṣātkṛtya yad yad eva bhāṣante deśayanty
K03pvspl_u:330: upadiśanti sarvan tad dharmatayā na viruddhyate tathāgata evaiṣa śāriputropāyakauśalyayogena
K03pvspl_u:331: bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyaty aviṣayo 'trāyuṣmāñ cchāriputra
K03pvspl_u:333: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat* bodhisatvo mahāsatva iti bhagavann
K03pvspl_u:334: ucyate kasyaitad bhagavan dharmasyādhivacanaṃ yad uta bodhisatva iti prajñāpāramiteti
K03pvspl_u:335: vā nāhaṃ bhagavaṃs tan dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi (PvSPL gā_b)
K03pvspl_u:336: yad uta bodhisatva iti prajñāpāramiteti vā so 'haṃ bhagavan bodhisatvam asamanupaśyan
K03pvspl_u:337: prajñāpāramitām apy anupalabhamānaḥ katamaṃ bodhisatvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām
K03pvspl_u:339: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocan nāmamātram idaṃ subhūte yad uta
K03pvspl_u:340: prajñāpāramiteti bodhisatva iti bodhisatvanāmeti tad api nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā
K03pvspl_u:341: nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate tadyathā pi nāma subhūte satvas satva iti nāmnocyate
K03pvspl_u:342: na ca kadācit satvopalabdhir yac ca nāma tad dharmaprajñaptimātran tasyāś ca dharmaprajñaptir
K03pvspl_u:344: tac ca nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate evam ātmasatvajīvajantupoṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajanakapaśyakā
K03pvspl_u:345: iti subhūte sarvam etad dharmaprajñaptimātran tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo
K03pvspl_u:346: na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketanamātreṇa vyavahriyate tac ca nāma nādhyātmān na bahirdhā
K03pvspl_u:347: nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate evam eva subhūte yad ucyate prajñāpāramiteti bodhisatva
K03pvspl_u:348: iti bodhisatvanāmeti sarvam etad dharmaprajñaptimātran tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter
K03pvspl_u:349: notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate tac ca nāma nādhyātmān
K03pvspl_u:350: na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate tadyathāpi nāma subhūte idam ādhyātmakaṃ
K03pvspl_u:351: rūpam iti sarvam etad dharmaprajñaptimātran tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na
K03pvspl_u:352: nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate tac ca nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā
